name: Heroside 2
description:
Heroside 2 is of course a sequel to Heroside hope nobody hates the surprise release, it was a request, anyway, if you want to record a video and post it as well, go right ahead.

story: after helping out the warrior 5 in the last game, Avery became a member. 2 days later while talking to Blake, her boyfriend. gearfox and novik call her up to have news, which she gets into a gang war, and the ground revealed as the Scyth clan, upped it up, from 5, to 10.
